channel.title: Raven Software / @RavenSoftware

item.title:
Pinned: Let's try something different! 😎
For next week's #Warzone Playlist update, we're letting you help us round it off.
Choose carefully.
🚛vs💰
item.dc:creator: @RavenSoftware
item.description: Let's try something different! 😎 For next week's #Warzone Playlist update, we're letting you help us round it off. Choose carefully. 🚛vs💰

item.title:
🛠️ We've released an update to allow those hard-earned Iron Trials '84 victories to count towards global #Warzone stats!
You did it once! Let's see you do it again. 😉
item.dc:creator: @RavenSoftware
item.description: 🛠️ We've released an update to allow those hard-earned Iron Trials '84 victories to count towards global #Warzone stats! You did it once! Let's see you do it again. 😉

item.title: R to @RavenSoftware: @BuhBerger get in here!
item.dc:creator: @RavenSoftware
item.description: @BuhBerger get in here!

item.title:
Love seeing how good it feels to win an Iron Trials '84 match! 🥇
...and you never know when we'll be watching. 👀
item.dc:creator: @RavenSoftware
item.description:
Love seeing how good it feels to win an Iron Trials '84 match! 🥇 ...and you never know when we'll be watching. 👀
nitter.net/halite_hunter/status/1438628074975895556#m

item.title:
We can't all be winners in the Iron Trials... but for those of us who are, there's an exclusive reward. 🥇
Hit us with a screenshot of that sweet W and your new Victory of Iron Trials '84 Calling Card in #Warzone!
item.dc:creator: @RavenSoftware
item.description: We can't all be winners in the Iron Trials... but for those of us who are, there's an exclusive reward. 🥇 Hit us with a screenshot of that sweet W and your new Victory of Iron Trials '84 Calling Card in #Warzone!

item.title:
⚒️ We have pushed a fix that resolves this issue. Server connections are stabilizing.
Thank you for your patience. 😊
item.dc:creator: @RavenSoftware
item.description:

item.title:
❗️ We're aware that some Players are experiencing connection issues with the new Iron Trials '84 mode in #Warzone.
We're investigating the issue now!
item.dc:creator: @RavenSoftware
item.description: ❗️ We're aware that some Players are experiencing connection issues with the new Iron Trials '84 mode in #Warzone. We're investigating the issue now!

item.title:
RT by @RavenSoftware: 📢 How about a little Blueprint Blitz as well?
It's back!
item.dc:creator: @RavenSoftware
item.description: 📢 How about a little Blueprint Blitz as well? It's back!

item.title:
Here's your weekly #Warzone playlist. Now live! 🎮
Adding: • Verdansk - Iron Trials '84 - Duos • Verdansk - Blood Money - Quads
Removing: • Verdansk - Core BR - Duos • Rebirth Island - Resurgence - Trios
Keeping: • Verdansk - Clash • Rebirth Island - Resurgence - Quads
item.dc:creator: @RavenSoftware
item.description: Here's your weekly #Warzone playlist. Now live! 🎮 Adding: • Verdansk - Iron Trials '84 - Duos • Verdansk - Blood Money - Quads Removing: • Verdansk - Core BR - Duos • Rebirth Island - Resurgence - Trios Keeping: • Verdansk - Clash • Rebirth Island - Resurgence - Quads

item.title: Actually, yes. You can fall from twice the height without taking damage in Iron Trials '84. 🚫🧢
item.dc:creator: @RavenSoftware
item.description:

item.title:
Now would be a good time to pick your Iron Trials 84' squad mate. You only get one, so choose carefully.
Tag them here to let us know who made the cut. 🤝
item.dc:creator: @RavenSoftware

item.title:
🥇 The Iron Trials are coming to #Warzone.
🥵 Get ready to get sweaty!
Full details here: https://bit.ly/IronTrials
item.dc:creator: @RavenSoftware
item.description: 🥇 The Iron Trials are coming to #Warzone. 🥵 Get ready to get sweaty! Full details here: bit.ly/IronTrials

item.title:
🛠️ A #Warzone update is now live!
This includes the Weapon and Attachment adjustments we shared yesterday and several Bug Fixes.
The Season Five Reloaded Patch Notes have been amended (see September 15th): https://bit.ly/39bXL6G
item.dc:creator: @RavenSoftware
item.description:

nitter.net/RavenSoftware/status/1437919381414100995#m

item.title:
The Stack Up Overwatch Program by @StackUpDotOrg is available 24 / 7 / 365 to anyone seeking peer-to-peer mental health support with a focus on Military Vets & Service Members.
Visit their discord and ask for the StOP squad to receive support.
http://discord.gg/stackupdotorg
item.dc:creator: @RavenSoftware
item.description:
The Stack Up Overwatch Program by @StackUpDotOrg is available 24 / 7 / 365 to anyone seeking peer-to-peer mental health support with a focus on Military Vets & Service Members. Visit their discord and ask for the StOP squad to receive support. discord.gg/stackupdotorg
nitter.net/RavenSoftware/status/1417228857355079693#m
